recipe_instructions: 1. Cook the pasta according to package directions. 2. While the pasta cooks, heat the Alfredo sauce in a saucepan over medium heat. 3. Drain the pasta and add it to the saucepan with the Alfredo sauce. 4. Toss to coat the pasta evenly in the sauce. 5. Serve immediately.

1. Cook the pasta according to package directions. 2. While the pasta cooks, melt butter in a pan. 3. Drain the pasta and add it to the pan with the butter. 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 5. Toss to combine and serve.

1. Cook the pasta according to package directions. 2. While the pasta is cooking, bring the milk to a simmer in a saucepan. 3. Drain the pasta and add it to the saucepan with the milk. 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 5. Stir to combine and serve warm.

1. Cook pasta according to package directions. 2. While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a pan. Add minced garlic and saute until fragrant. 3. Drain pasta and add to the pan with garlic oil. 4. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to coat. 5. Serve warm.

1. Cook pasta according to package directions. 2. Meanwhile, melt butter in a pan. 3. Drain the pasta and add it to the pan with the melted butter. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Toss to combine and serve immediately.
